page.title: 13A Day in the life of David
page.content: Next we go into the hall to have lunch at twelve o'clock. After that we have half an hour break time. I usually play football. We go back in for an art or craft lesson, then another break time. After that we come in for art, literature or health education. At half past three my Dad picks me up and then we pick up my sister from High-Tunstall school. When we get home I have my tea while watching the television. After tea I play for half an hour. Then I get ready for school swimming club. After I have put my towel and what I need in my bag I get my coat on and my mam takes me to swimming club. When I get home I have a blancmange, which is a frozen food, then I watch television and go to bed at half past nine.
